text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almkdhbyn: aminu bialquran 'aw la twmnu; fa'iina 'iimanikum la yzydh kmala wtkdhybkm la yulhiq bih nqsana. 'iina aleulama' aladhin 'uwtuu alkutub alssabiqat min qibal alqran, werfu hqyqt alwhy, 'iidha quri ealayhim alquran ykhshewn, fysjdwn ealaa wujuhuhum lilah subhanah wteala
